languages.text: "Изворотливая Вил'Джай не ровня тебе — ни душой, ни помыслами. Ее пустые речи и нелепые деяния — цветная скорлупа, что не в силах спрятать изъязвленные остатки нетвердой веры".

traits.locale_text: "Изворотливая Тэй'Джай не ровня тебе — ни душой, ни помыслами. Ее пустые речи и нелепые деяния — цветная скорлупа, что не в силах спрятать изъязвленные остатки нетвердой веры".

languages.text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."
languages.original_text: "Изворотливая Вил'Джай не ровня тебе — ни душой, ни помыслами. Ее пустые речи и нелепые деяния — цветная скорлупа, что не в силах спрятать изъязвленные остатки нетвердой веры".

traits.locale_text: "The evasive Tei'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal what remains of her teetering faith."
"The evasive Tei'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal what remains of her teetering faith."

"The evasive Tei'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

"The evasive Tei'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

"The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

"The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

languages.text: «La elusiva Vil'Jae no es su igual, ni en espíritu ni en pensamiento. Sus palabras vacuas y sus bufonadas no son más que un cascarón histriónico incapaz de ocultar lo poco que queda de su precaria devoción».
languages.original_text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

traits.locale_text: «La elusiva Vil'Jae no es su igual, ni en espíritu ni en pensamiento. Sus palabras vacuas y sus bufonadas no son más que un cascarón histriónico incapaz de ocultar lo poco que queda de su precaria devoción».

languages.text: 「逃げ腰のヴィルジェイは、魂においても施行においてもあなたと同格ではないわ。彼女の浅はかな言葉と茶番じみた行動は色鮮やかな殻にすぎず、揺れ動く信仰の残骸を隠すことはできない」
languages.original_text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

traits.locale_text: 「逃げ腰のヴィルジェイは、魂においても施行においてもあなたと同格ではないわ。彼女の浅はかな言葉と茶番じみた行動は色鮮やかな殻にすぎず、揺れ動く信仰の残骸を隠すことはできない」

languages.text: “那个巧言令色的敌者婕伊根本无法与你相提并论，无论是从灵魂上，还是从思想上。她肤浅的言语和荒诞的行为，不过是色彩斑斓的外壳罢了，全然无法掩饰她那摇摇欲坠、岌岌可危的信仰。”
languages.original_text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

traits.locale_text: “那个巧言令色的敌者婕伊根本无法与你相提并论，无论是从灵魂上，还是从思想上。她肤浅的言语和荒诞的行为，不过是色彩斑斓的外壳罢了，全然无法掩饰她那摇摇欲坠、岌岌可危的信仰。”

languages.text: "Die ausweichende Vil'Jae kann Euch nicht das Wasser reichen, weder seelisch noch gedanklich. Ihre geistlosen Worte und albernen Taten sind nur eine bunte Hülle, die nicht verbergen kann, wie wenig von ihrem schwankenden Glauben übrig ist."
languages.original_text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

traits.locale_text: "Die ausweichende Vil'Jae kann Euch nicht das Wasser reichen, weder seelisch noch gedanklich. Ihre geistlosen Worte und albernen Taten sind nur eine bunte Hülle, die nicht verbergen kann, wie wenig von ihrem schwankenden Glauben übrig ist."

languages.text: « L'insaisissable Vil'Jae n'est pas votre égale, ni au tréfonds de son âme ni dans ses pensées. Ses paroles creuses et ses agissements absurdes ne sont qu'une carapace criarde derrière laquelle elle s'efforce en vain de dissimuler sa foi vacillante. »
languages.original_text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

traits.locale_text: « L'insaisissable Vil'Jae n'est pas votre égale, ni au tréfonds de son âme ni dans ses pensées. Ses paroles creuses et ses agissements absurdes ne sont qu'une carapace criarde derrière laquelle elle s'efforce en vain de dissimuler sa foi vacillante. »

languages.original_text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."

languages.text: "Düzenbaz Vil'Jae, ne ruhta ne de akılda senin dengin olamaz. Sığ lafları ve gülünç davranışları, imanının nasıl da sallantıda olduğunu saklamayı başaramıyor."
languages.original_text: "The evasive Vil'Jae is not your equal, neither in soul nor in thought. Her shallow words and farcical deeds are but a colourful shell that cannot conceal just how little remains of her teetering faith."
